channel.title: Rep++ For Help
channel.description: Alright i dont do custom items very much but i liek bandos scimmy and im trying to add it and when i do drop model is fine and inv model is fine but when i equipt it its a gadder hammer so i would like help on how to make it equipt as bandos scimmy rep++ to anyone that tells me how thanks

item.title: Rep++ For Help
item.dc:creator: @nicks nicks
item.description:
@nicks wrote:

Pblord7:

Then just change the ID of the item

nvm i figured it out wasn’t any of that but thanks for trying to help. was a stupid mistake on my part
rep++ anyways

Read full topic

item.title: Rep++ For Help
item.dc:creator: @Pblord7 Pblord7
item.description:
@Pblord7 wrote:

Then just change the ID of the item

Read full topic

item.title: Rep++ For Help
item.dc:creator: @nicks nicks
item.description:
@nicks wrote:

[quote=“Pblord7, post:2, topic:372757”]Ok, lets say the models are: 302 and 424
So add them to your models folder
Add it to Class8
Compile
Open client and login
type:
add model 302
add model 424

Exactly how I did it, no ::[/quote]
yes i know all of this but it stil comes up as a gadderhammer is there somthing im doing wrong? i’ve seen otehr people with the same problem

Read full topic

item.title: Rep++ For Help
item.dc:creator: @Pblord7 Pblord7
item.description:
@Pblord7 wrote:

Ok, lets say the models are: 302 and 424
So add them to your models folder
Add it to Class8
Compile
Open client and login
type:
add model 302
add model 424

Exactly how I did it, no ::

Read full topic
